content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Gopal Varma.

Written by Balaji.

Cast Shivarajkumar(A Special Task Force strategist (as Shivaraj Kumar)). Sandeep Bharadwaj(Veerappan). Sadh Orhan(Gandhi). Rahaao(Gandhi) . Rajesh Nataranga(STF Officer Balu). Ramesh Pandit(Kadhani). Yagna Shetty(Muthulakshmi). Mahendra Shrivas(Veerappan’s Right Hand). K.S. Sridhar(K Vijay Kumar (as K.P. Sridhar)). Rockline Venkatesh(T Harikrishna). Sanchari Vijay(STF Officer Gopal). Gadda Viji(Pandillapalli Srinivas). Parul Yadav(STF spy / Shreya (as Pavithra))

Language Kannada.

Producers Pradip Khairwar. Sudheer Chandra Padiri.

Production G R Pictures. Goldmines Telefilms. Zed3 Pictures.
